subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Correspondence

messageBody:
-----Oorspronkelijk bericht-----
Van: Sidney Tanaban <sidban2@...>
Aan: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com <Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com>
Datum: vrijdag 22 februari 2002 20:21
Onderwerp: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Correspondence


>Hi!
>I am interested in corresponding but I have no idea what you guys are
doing. Could explain step by step what to do to see the Quikskript? And
how do you write in Quikskript on Internet?
>Sid


You can go to http://groups.yahoo.com/Read_Alphabet and log in. Click on
'files' browse around here and eventually you will find a truetype font and
some accompanying files to help you out.

The current mapping of Quickscript characters to our current English
keyboards is quite a pain, and I (with a few others) am discussing changing
this using special software that can easily be created.

Ewout
